data.name: Break the G̵amè̢̢͘
data.detailed_description:
.


Į́ ͟͢͢DID̡̀ ͜N̛O̷T̸̵ ̶͟WRI͞͞͞T̵̀͡E̸ T̛HI͝͞S, ͢͞D҉Ò̷̕N̸̕͏'T̴ ̀͜LĄ͘UŅC̡H ͘͢͡TH͜E͜ ̨̕͢GĄ̛MEST̕AY̛ ͘͢Ą́͝W̷̷AY
S̡TA̢Y̛ ҉̨A̶W͠A̸̡͡Y̢͢
Ś̢͟TA̛Y͏͏́ ̶́͘AWA̸̕Y
S͢TA̕͟͡Y ̶̧̡AW̵͜A̷͡Y̶̨
ST̢͝AY A̢W҉̀͞Ą́͘YST́AY̵͠ ͜͞A͜͟͝WA̸̧͘Y
ST͞A̡Y͠ ̢̢AW̢͞AY҉̷
Ş̕T̸̡͞A̷̸̡Y̛͘͜ ̀͘A̧WA͟Y
STA͢͏Ý̴ ̷͏AW̴҉AY
S҉̀TAÝ̷͜ AWAY̵̧
S̷̸̢T̵AY͜͡͝ AWÁ́Y̧̢̕
STA͘̕͘Y͢͏ A̕͟W͘͏͜AỲ͘
ST́ÁY ́͟͟AẂAY
d
f̶̨s̨fẃ̵̕
3-4-littleboy
e

.

Hey, I'm Kevin,

I've been trapped here for 8259 days.
I don't know why, but someone is keeping me here.
I need someone from the outside.
You.

Yeah, I know what you're thinking;
"What's in it for me?"
I'm way ahead of you pal, I prepared a list of key features!

  • Character-rich story with focus on humor (Except if we meet Jeff, his humor is catastrophic.)
  • Complete customization of ALL abilities (Just don't remove my speech-ability.)
  • An utterly amazing companion (Yeah, that's me.)
  • A fun game (Just trust me on this.)
  • Choices you make change the story and interactions (Just do the right choices, OK?
  • Atmospheric 2D platformer
  • Cool stuff (There's some cool stuff in here. Yeah.)
  • And the cherry on top, I'll give you a free hat when I'm free.

I'll see you in the game.

- Kevin

.

The game is the sequel to Escape the Game, which is heavily influenced from games like Undertale, Thomas was Alone, The Stanley Parable, Lisa and various story-driven games. Throughout the whole game, Kevin and other characters will constantly talk with you. Banter on choices you make or just talk about random pointless stuff. The game also includes a collection of abilities with a unique twist to them - to break the game's boundaries.

Can you help him break the game and free him?
I don't think so.

(Follow the development on twitter)
@Insanity_Games_

.

data.short_description: This game is about Kevin, He's been stuck in his gaf̶̨s̨fẃ̵̕ HEY, YOU, STAY AWA̸̧͘Y, IT'S ME KEVIN, THERE'S NO POINT, D҉Ò̷̕N̸̕͏'T-- Follow him in this adventurous and humor-filled story to ｄ̶̢͙̟̦̺̰̫̙̋̊͐̐͑͋̈́̕̕͝ ｄｉｅ
